ComicInfo.Title: Let Me Light Your Fire
ComicInfo.Summary: Let Me Light Your Fire: J. C. Pratt is assaulted by Lucian Long, Emma's husband. As The Crush, he eavesdrops on the Congress of Crime. When The Crush confronts Squeegee at Steel Point Nuclear Power Plant, Lucian Long sets off an explosion while they are both in the reactor room.
ComicInfo.Characters: Emma Long,Chuck,Ed Dexter,Roy Radnauer,Janeen,Albert Feldstein,Hymie,Isaac (a squeal),Otto,The Crush [J. C. Pratt],Squeegee [Hector Diaz] (origin, first full appearance),Lucian Long,Ally
